data.name: Username_Length_is_Invalid !!!
data.description:
Computer Science has its Terminologies . String is one of them . String is any Word , name , or any aplanumeric . 

Some websites Registeration has restrictions . Username must be less than or Equall 12 charhcters .

in this kata , We Will Learn to count the number of characters in this username to judge its valid or not . 

But , There are Rules :

1- Will no use .length() , strlen Built-in Functions .

2- if Username length less than or equall 12 Charhcters , return the Length .

3- if the username is longer than 12 , return 0 ;

Awaiting For your Feedback ... 

Hope You Enjoy it ... Keep on Learning ...
